mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HABIT_TRACKER VALUES(SEQ_HT.NEXTVAL, #{id}, #{ht_title}, #{ht_type}, #{ht_goal}, #{ht_unit}, #{ht_cycle}, SYSDATE, #{ht_amount}, #{ht_color}, #{ht_con}, DEFAULT)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM HABIT_TRACKER WHERE ID=#{id} AND HT_DELETE='N'
SELECT * FROM HABIT_TRACKER WHERE ID=#{id} AND HT_DELETE='N' ORDER BY HT_NO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HABIT_TRACKER_RECORD VALUES (SEQ_HTR.NEXTVAL, #{id}, #{ht_no}, SYSDATE, #{htr_now}, #{htr_con}, DEFAULT)
mapper.select: SELECT HTR_NO, ID, HT_NO, TO_CHAR(HTR_DATE, 'DD') AS "HTR_MONTH", TO_CHAR(HTR_DATE, 'HH:MI') AS "HTR_TIME", HTR_NOW, HTR_CON, HTR_DELETE FROM HABIT_TRACKER_RECORD WHERE ID=#{id} AND HT_NO=#{ht_no} AND HTR_DELETE='N' AND HTR_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(TRUNC(SYSDATE,'IW'), 'YY/MM/DD') AND TO_DATE(TRUNC(SYSDATE,'IW') + 7, 'YY/MM/DD') ORDER BY HTR_DATE DESC

SELECT HT.HT_NO, SUM(HTR_NOW) AS HT_NOW FROM HABIT_TRACKER_RECORD HTR JOIN HABIT_TRACKER HT ON (HT.HT_NO = HTR.HT_NO) WHERE HT.HT_CYCLE = 'Daily' AND HT.ID = #{id} AND TO_CHAR(HTR.HTR_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD') = #{ht_start} AND HT.HT_DELETE = 'N' GROUP BY HT.HT_NO

SELECT HT.HT_NO, SUM(HTR_NOW) AS HT_NOW FROM HABIT_TRACKER_RECORD HTR JOIN HABIT_TRACKER HT ON (HT.HT_NO = HTR.HT_NO) WHERE HT.HT_CYCLE = 'Monthly' AND HT.ID = #{id} AND TO_CHAR(HTR.HTR_DATE, 'YY/MM') = #{ht_start} AND HT.HT_DELETE = 'N' GROUP BY HT.HT_NO

SELECT HT.HT_NO, SUM(HTR_NOW) AS HT_NOW FROM HABIT_TRACKER_RECORD HTR JOIN HABIT_TRACKER HT ON (HT.HT_NO = HTR.HT_NO) WHERE HT.HT_CYCLE = 'Weekly' AND HT.ID = #{id} AND HT.HT_DELETE = 'N' AND HTR_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(TRUNC(SYSDATE,'IW'), 'YY/MM/DD') AND TO_DATE(TRUNC(SYSDATE,'IW') + 7, 'YY/MM/DD') GROUP BY HT.HT_NO
